rooms.description: Art Deco styled entrance hall with decorative moldings and geometric patterns. Features a vestibule area for guests.
Spacious living room that embodies Art Deco aesthetics with bold colors and streamlined furniture. Incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light, offering views of the exterior.
Dining area adjacent to the living room with elegant Art Deco detailing and a central dining table setup.
Modern kitchen integrated with Art Deco elements, featuring sleek cabinetry, geometric backsplash designs, and an island counter for additional workspace.

Master bedroom designed in Art Deco style with luxurious finishes, floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring a bright environment. Incorporates Vastu by positioning the bed in the northeast corner for prosperity.
Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom featuring Art Deco fixtures and a modern design that respects Vastu principles with proper orientation of water elements.
Dedicated library space with built-in bookshelves, comfortable seating area, and decorative Art Deco motifs. Features a bay window to maximize natural lighting.
